articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Hungnam Fertilizer Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Hungnam Fertilizer Complex
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and Pak Nam Gi, department director of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 He went round the newly reconstructed various production processes to acquaint himself in detail with the technological updating and production there.
					
					Watching the workers of the complex engaged in their production drive, he expressed great satisfaction over the devoted efforts being made by all its party members and other working people to accomplish the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					He highly appreciated the feats performed by the workers of Hungnam, noting that they have played a vanguard role in putting the production processes on a modern and scientific basis as required by the age of IT, true to the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science.
					
					He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the complex, saying that its position and role are very important for boosting the agricultural production to a high level.
					
					In order to solve the food scarcity it is necessary to send a lot of fertilizers to the countryside, he noted, adding that this heavy yet honorable task is devolved to the workers of Hungnam.
					
					The construction of a new gasification and ammonia production process proposed by the complex is a bold and creative initiative reflecting the urgent requirement of the developing agriculture in the country, he said, settling knotty problems after having an exhaustive consultation with its officials about ways of constructing it.
					
					 After making the round of Hamhung City, he guided the work for building the city, examining a model board for its construction.
					
					 He stressed that in order to build Hamhung City where a large number of workers live into a modern city under a long-term plan to cater to the aesthetic taste in the era of the WPK it is necessary to design it in such manner as to strictly abide by the principles of socialism and popular character, construct all objects in a unique manner including the formation of roads, styles of buildings and their layout, creation of pleasure grounds and formation of cultural and sporting areas and especially pay deep attention to the construction of network under the city and its heating system.
					
					 He praised South Hamgyong Province for making thoroughgoing preparations for constructing on its own a power station with large capacity at the estuary of the River Kumjin with a view to solving the problem of electricity in Hamhung and indicated the orientation and ways of completing the project in a brief span of time.
					
					He got familiar with researches at the Hamhung Branch of the Academy of Sciences, examining newly developed products.
					
					He appreciated the efforts made by the scientists and technicians of the branch, greatly pleased to learn that they have developed building materials of Korean style by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm.
					
					 During his field guidance to South Hamgyong Province, he acquainted himself with the overall work in the province and once again indicated the way for it to follow.
					
					 South Hamgyong Province occupies an important place in the development of the nation's economy as it has many key industrial enterprises, big factories which play an important role in solving the problems of clothing, food and housing in particular, he noted, underscoring the need for the province to perform a vanguard role in the drive for opening the gate to a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the command of KPA Large Combined Unit 324.
					Conducted by the commander of the unit, Kim Jong Il looked round the room dedicated to the unit's history.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung closely linked with the history of the unit, he noted that the unit could grow to be an invincible large combined unit made up of a-match-for-a-hundred combined and other units under the wise guidance and meticulous care of the President.
					
					 He praised the unit for having well furnished the history room and conducted brisk education through it, underscoring the need to intensify the education in virtues to help servicepersons always remember the deep benevolence of the President.
					
					 He read the records of victories showing the course of shining feats covered by the unit.
					
					 He highly appreciated the exploits of the unit, saying that it has a long history as it has performed great feats in defence of the country and socialist construction up to now from the days of the hard-fought war by displaying unrivaled patriotic devotion and popular heroism for the party and the leader, the country and the people.
					
					He learned about the unit's performance of duty and praised all its servicepersons for having performed their guard duties in a responsible manner while sharply watching the moves of the enemies for aggression. And he advanced highly important tasks to be fulfilled by the unit to increase its combat capability in every way.
					
					 Then he went round an operation study room and a shooting hall to acquaint himself with the training of commanding officers.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the unit well furnished the military study rooms and has conducted training in an effective way to prepare all the commanding officers as competent officers possessed of high abilities to organize and command operations and combats, he stressed that the revolutionary habit of training should be thoroughly established to make all the commanding officers acquire the commanding ability as required by modern warfare.
					
					 He also made the rounds of a library and other facilities for ideological and cultural education to learn in detail about how the political work has been conducted among servicepersons.
					
					Pleased to learn that the said facilities have been well furnished to suit the characters of servicepersons, the political work is being done in a fresh and profound way and all the servicepersons fully enjoy a cultural and emotional life, he underlined the need to always give priority to the ideological work.
					
					 It is very good that all servicepersons of the unit are studying hard as avid readers, he said, highly appreciating the revolutionary habit of reading established at the unit.
					
					Walking round the compound of the command, he acquainted himself with the management of the unit.
					
					 The unit has made signal progress in its management and all other aspects, to say nothing of the combat and political training, he noted, highly estimating the achievements made by the unit over the past years.
					
					 He had a photo session with servicepersons of the unit.
					
					 Accompanying him were KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Appreciates Art Performance of Servicepersons
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Appreciates Art Performance of Servicepersons
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with servicepersons appreciated a performance given by the art squad of KPA Large Combined Unit 324.
					 Among the audience were Generals of the KPA Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Members of the art squad put on the stage male solo "We Long for You, General", male chorus "It Is Me", female chorus "Soldier Felt Warmth in His Heart" and other numbers of various genres.
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the iron faith and will of the servicepersons to devotedly safeguard the headquarters of the revolution and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche that started in the thick forests of Mt. Paektu with arms.
					
					 They, at the same time, fully exhibited such enthusiasm and spirit with which they encouraged the soldiers to wage struggles and perform feats by conducting militant frontline agitation at the sides of trenches, drill grounds and construction sites, thus clearly proving the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy of conducting art activities the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did and strikingly demonstrating the might of soldiers' art group which creditably performs its sacred mission as a bugler in the Songun era by instilling the ardent love for the Party and the leader and the country and the people into the servicepersons.
					
					 He praised the members of the art squad for conducting dynamic art activities for the ideological education of the servicepersons.
					
					 Noting that the art agitation with great influence and strong appeal in the ideological education of the servicepersons is of very weighty importance, he set forth tasks for intensifying the revolutionary and militant art agitation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Song and Dance Performance Given by Artistes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Song and Dance Performance Given by Artistes
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated a song and dance performance given by artistes of the South Hamgyong Provincial Art Troupe.
					 Among the audience were Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army.
					
					 The art troupe put on the stage female solo "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", dance "The Glow over Kangson", female solo and chorus "Song of Front Rankers in Chollima Movement" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the revolutionary stamina and optimism, the faith in sure victory and the indomitable will of the Korean people dynamically advancing towards the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation, holding high the torch of a new revolutionary surge lit by
						Kim Jong Il. They, at the same time, powerfully demonstrated the might of the art troupe which has grown to be a revolutionary art group under the care of the party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation.
					
					 He highly appreciated the success made in the performance and extended thanks to the artistes, expressing great satisfaction over the splendid performance of high ideological value and artistry given by them.
					
					 He gave a high appreciation of the feats performed by the above-said art troupe with a long history, noting that it greatly contributed to the art creation including the production of revolutionary operas in the past and has created many excellent works high in ideological value and artistry as required by the new century by steadily giving full play to the WPK's original principles and traits of creating art works which had been embodied when the five revolutionary operas were produced, thereby creditably fulfilling its mission and duty as a true creator and firm protector of the socialist culture and arts.
					
					 He repeatedly praised the earnest creative attitude of the artistes of the troupe, noting that they could steadily raise their level of representation by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm to the tenacious drive to raise their artistic ability.
					
					 It is the basic mission of the Juche-based art to help people acquire genuine idea, morality and culture necessary for leading an independent life as human beings, he said, setting forth highly important tasks for further developing the arts as required by the Songun era.

articles.title: Greetings to Prime Minister of Grenada
articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Grenada
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Friday sent a message of greetings to Tillman Thomas, Prime Minister of Grenada, on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of independence of his country. 
					 The message wished him success in his work for development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Paektusan Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Paektusan Prize Opens
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The sports contest for Paektusan Prize was opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street Friday.
					The sports contest takes place every year on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il.
					
					During the period of the contest nine sports events including basketball, volleyball, ice hockey and speed skating will take place in Pyongyang and Samjiyon.
					
					Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and sportsmen.
					
					Chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission Pak Hak Son's opening address was followed by speeches.

articles.title: Quality Materials for Roof and Wall Produced
articles.content:
Quality Materials for Roof and Wall Produced
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Hard iron roofing materials and wall boards of various forms, sizes and colors are being produced in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 As the roofing materials and wall boards are made with hard iron plates painted with high-strength enamel to prevent corrosion, they are very strong in resistance to nature and keep long their inherent ingredients and color.
					
					 The hard iron color plate is widely used as roofing materials of industrial buildings. It being light in weight and easy to assemble, it is also applicable to the construction of open-air stores and to partitioning  of offices and living rooms, etc.
					
					 The heat insulating composite board is a building material retaining heat and cold, which is made by attaching color iron plates to both sides of the foam plastic board. Its form, length and thickness can be changed according to uses so it is convenient for the construction of exterior walls and roofs of buildings.
					
					 The hard iron color plate and wall board are popular for their modern aesthetic value and good architectural effect.

articles.title: Harmonious Whole in Which Leader Believes in People and People Follow Leader
articles.content:
Harmonious Whole in Which Leader Believes in People and People Follow Leader
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- This year's joint editorial says that the glorious tradition of engraving an immortal heroic epic by dint of a harmonious whole in which the leader believes in the people and people trust in and follow their leader absolutely should be inherited firmly.
					The harmonious whole of the leader and the popular masses is the source of the all victories of the Korean people.
					
					The historical cause of national liberation and the great victory in the Korean War which the leader and people achieved by uniting closely in ideology and will are shining brightly with the prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					Epoch-making miracles were wrought in succession in the DPRK under the banner of single-minded unity in the post-war period when everything fell short of need and conditions were harsh.
					
					President Kim Il Sung visited the then Kangson Steel Works in December Juche 45 (1956) when the situation within and without the country was grim. He earnestly appealed to the workers to tide over the difficulties in the revolution, they trusting in him and he believing in them, saying the country would stretch its back if it could have ten thousand more tons of steel.
					
					The deep loving care and trust of the President heralded the great era in which Chollima flew high in the sky over this land and became the motive force which enabled the Korean people to write a heroic epic in the chronicle of the revolution.
					
					The workers of Kangson wrought the miracle of producing 120,000 tons of steel slab at a blooming mill with a rated capacity of 60,000 tons by shattering conservatism and passivism and racing at the speed of Chollima.
					
					The flame of innovation that flared up at Kangson spread all over the country as the torch of the general advance of Chollima with the results that the furnace men of the then Kim Chaek Iron Works produced 270,000 tons of pig iron at a furnace with a rated capacity of 190,000 tons and the automakers turned out the first trial product in a matter of 40 days.
					
					Meanwhile, builders of the capital city constructed houses for 20,000 households with materials, fund and workforce for 7,000 households and railway builders finished in two months and a half the railroad construction between Haeju and Hasong which would have taken 3 or 4 years at ordinary speed. Great leaping progresses were witnessed on all fronts of socialist construction.
					
					The harmonious whole in Korea made it possible to carry out industrialization in the short period of 14 years, which had taken others several hundred years and turned the country into a socialist power of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in defense, though the U.S. imperialists had predicted that it would be unable to rise up even in one hundred years.
					
					The Korean people who have triumphantly covered the long road of revolution, firmly believing only in their leader are still working miracles and effecting innovations incessantly in the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation, bringing another revolutionary upsurge with the might of harmonious whole.

articles.title: Japan's Ambition to Grab Tok Islet Flayed
articles.content:
Japan's Ambition to Grab Tok Islet Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- It was recently ascertained that the Japanese government excluded Tok Islet of Korea from the islands affiliated to Japan in ordinances promulgated in the past. "Ordinance of the prime minister's office No. 24" and "ordinance of the Finance Ministry No. 4" announced in Japan in 1951 classified islands into those that were its colonies in the past and those belonging to Japan, thus stipulating that Tok Islet as well as Ullung and Jeju Islands do not belong to Japan. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in this regard:
					
					 The Japanese government revised these ordinances in 1960 and 1968 but left intact the article which said that Tok Islet shall be excluded from Japan's archipelago.
					
					 These data of legal validity clearly prove that Japan is left with no justification to claim dominium over Tok Islet in view of domestic law of Japan and it is a height of hooliganism for Japan to persistently assert that the islet belongs to it. The assertion is, in the final analysis, prompted by its black-hearted intention to spark off territorial disputes and thus invent a pretext for launching reinvasion.
					
					 As for the issue of the relations between Korea and Japan over the dominium over Tok Islet, it is an issue for Japan to make reparation to the DPRK for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists by invading Korea and grabbing Tok Islet in the past. 
					
					 The Japanese ruling quarters and paid historians are persistently asserting that Tok Islet belongs to Japan based on groundless "data" while working hard to destroy historical evidence proving truth. This will only bring into bolder relief the true nature of Japan as the most shameless robber of the territory of other country.
					
					 Japan is giving eye-teeth for the inviolable territory of Korea but it will get it nowhere and bring no benefit to it. 
					
					 The Korean nation is heightening vigilance against Japan's evermore undisguised moves to grab Tok Islet and is keeping itself fully ready to resolutely smash them.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to properly understand who its rival is and drop its ambition to grab Tok Islet.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The work "On Further Strengthening the Party's Guidance over Construction of Socialist Economy" published by President Kim Il Sung on February 6, Juche 68 (1979), serves as precious guidelines to be held fast to by all the party organizations and officials in their present drive to make the country an economic power. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article dedicated to the anniversary of the publication of the work.
					The work expounds the importance and significance of the party guidance over the socialist economic construction, the issue for the party organizations to dynamically arouse the party members and other working people to implementing the economic policy of the party, the issue for the leading party officials, in particular, to lead the economic work in a responsible manner and the issue for the party officials to thoroughly equip themselves with the party's policy and decisively increase the level of economic, scientific and technical knowledge and so on.
					
					 Noting that all the successes achieved by the Korean people under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea in the 1970s, 1980s and recent years would have been unthinkable without the fresh and substantial guidance of the party organizations over the work of economy true to the intention of the President, the article goes on:
					
					 The line and policy of the WPK clearly indicate the goal and task for the drive for the economic construction and the ways to implement them at present. 
					
					 A great surge will be brought about on all fronts of building a thriving nation when all the party organizations and officials thoroughly equip themselves with the party's idea and line, and work as required by them regarding the party's policy as their lifeline.
					
					 All the party organizations and officials should make positive contributions to bringing about a decisive turn in the building of an economic power with the new revolutionary upswing by steadily and thoroughly implementing the idea set forth by the President in the work.

articles.title: Struggle under Slogan "Let Us Live Not Merely for Today But for Tomorrow!" Called for
articles.content:
Struggle under Slogan "Let Us Live Not Merely for Today But for Tomorrow!" Called for
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today editorially calls for vigorously carrying on the struggle for the bright future of the socialist fatherland under the uplifted slogan "Let us live not merely for today but for tomorrow!"
					The Korean revolution was pioneered and has advanced victoriously thanks to the peerlessly great men who looked after the destiny of the country and the nation with noble responsibility and showed warm loving care for the future, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					We should certainly materialize the Party's intention and decision to fling open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 in which falls the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung in order to demonstrate to the world the bright future of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun Korea.
					
					It is the great outlook on the revolution, the outlook on the future of General Secretary Kim Jong Il that the revolution is the cause to keep the love for the people flourish and that one should devote everything to the future of the country and the happiness of all generations to come although one may not enjoy life's pleasure in one's generation.
					
					We should adorn every moment of our lives with praiseworthy feats to keep pace with Kim Jong Il who is making ceaseless journey of the Songun leadership with noble patriotic devotion. 
					
					The anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners are the first generation of the Korean revolution who thoroughly embodied the revolutionary view on life of living not merely for today but for tomorrow and set an example of how to bring into full bloom the love for the future.
					
					Only when the rising generations successfully inherit the noble spirit and the fighting traits displayed by the revolutionary forerunners, can they successfully carry forward the lifeline of the revolution and our country prosper forever.
					
					We should leave clear footprints of patriotism to be remembered long by the generations to come in today's worthwhile struggle creating a new history of a great revolutionary surge.
					
					The future of Songun Korea is immensely bright and there are no revolutionary people as the Korean people who struggle and advance full of great ambition and hope for the future.
					
					The on-going general advance for building a great prosperous powerful nation is sure to triumph as long as there are the seasoned and tested leadership of the great Party, the invincible revolutionary armed forces and the single-minded unity cemented in the crucible of the Songun revolution and the mental power of all the servicepersons and people stronger than a nuclear weapon.

articles.title: Unity of Patriotic Force Called for
articles.content:
Unity of Patriotic Force Called for
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Unity of the patriotic force serves as a decisive guarantee for advancing the victorious movement of independent reunification of fellow countrymen by smashing all sorts of challenges of history, Rodong Sinmun today says in a signed article.
					 No one can settle the issue of Korea's reunification related to national sovereignty in place of the Korean people and it is none other than the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad who are responsible for it, the article notes, and continues: 
					
					 Paying lip-service to national reunification while inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen and seeking the split of the country, contrary to their reconciliation and unity are treachery little short of opposing the national reunification and harming the interests of the nation. 
					
					All the patriotic force in the north and the south and abroad should advance in close unity under the banner of independent reunification. Herein lies a main key to achieving the reunification and prosperity by the efforts of Koreans despite of any challenge on the part of separatists at home and abroad. 
					
					The reality goes to prove that unless the patriotic force in south Korea turns out as one in the struggle for the national reunification in close unity, south Koreans' desire for independence, democracy and national reunification can be trampled down by the fascist tyrants and irrevocably serious consequences be entailed.
					
					It is hard to say that one has fulfilled one's mission as a member of the Korean nation at present if one sits with folded arms calling for the country's reunification and denouncing traitors in word only. 
					
					Whoever loves the country and worries over the destiny of the nation ought to join in an unflinching struggle for the great national unity. 
					
					If all classes and strata closely unite on the principle of putting the desire and interests common to the nation above anything else irrespective of differing ideology, political view, religious belief, property status and social position, the strength of the patriotic forces will grow strong enough to clear any obstacle lying in the way.
					
					 When the people from all walks of life in the north and the south and abroad achieve firm unity as a patriotic force, no force on earth can match it and the Korean nation's just cause will surely emerge victorious, the article concludes.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Killing of Evacuees Slashed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Killing of Evacuees Slashed
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice issued a declaration on the situation on Feb. 2 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its killing of evacuees in Ryongsan.
					 The declaration said that as proven through the recent tragic incident in Ryongsan, there is no reason for the Lee Myung Bak "government" disregarding the people and mercilessly using violence on them to exist.
					
					 Instead of apologizing for the said murder, Lee has patronized the police and the prosecution seeking to hush up the truth behind the incident, it pointed out, saying that such imprudent action is enraging the people.
					
					 It is unpardonable that the Lee "government" is justifying the said crime under the pretext of "law and order" while branding the civic and public organizations protesting the murder as a "group of terrorists" and "leftists", it said.
					
					 The lives and security of the people can no longer be entrusted to the present silly ruler who is enslaved by arrogance and avarice, the declaration said, adding that they will resist the "government" by strength of the people.

articles.title: Punishment of Murderers Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Murderers Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan of south Korea launched a signature campaign for punishing the mastermind of the murder of evacuees on Feb. 3.
					The organization called a press conference in Seoul that day, at which it condemned Lee Myung Bak for seeking to nominate to the post of chief of the south Korean Police Office Kim Sok Gi, chief of the Seoul District Police Office who directly commanded the killing of evacuees in Ryongsan.
					
					 It declared that it would stage the signature campaign in all parts of south Korea in demand of the punishment of the chief murderer. 
					
					The organization will also conduct one-man demos outside police stations across south Korea on Feb. 4 in protest against his nomination as chief of the police office and in demand of the punishment of him, it stated.

articles.title: Anti-Lee Myung Bak Struggle Called for
articles.content:
Anti-Lee Myung Bak Struggle Called for 
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Measure Committee for Frustrating the Plot to Fake up the Case for Suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea on Feb. 2 released an appeal calling on all the people to turn out in the referendum to judge the puppet Lee Myung Bak regime.
					 The appeal condemned Lee and the "Grand National Party" for persistently resorting to the policy for a handful of the privileged and the rich only, disregarding the demand of the people despite the situation in which no one can pin hope on tomorrow due to the deteriorating economic crisis and unemployment problem, etc.
					
					 It denounced Lee for pursuing the policy of confrontation with the DPRK and pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase by totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, in particular.
					
					 The treacherous nature of the Lee regime was more glaringly revealed through the recent tragic incident in Ryongsan, said the appeal.
					
					 If all the people pool their efforts, they can put an end to the dictatorial policy of the Lee regime without fail, the appeal noted, calling for participating in the referendum to clearly show the resentment of the people against the Lee regime.

articles.title: World Organization Assails S. Korean Authorities
articles.content:
World Organization Assails S. Korean Authorities
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The European regional office of the World Federation of Trade Unions sent a letter to traitor Lee Myung Bak on Jan. 26, protesting against the south Korean authorities' moves against democracy and reunification.
					 The letter wrote that the office bitterly denounces the reality of south Korea, in which trade unionists are being arrested and detained in prison, as unpardonable.
					
					We demand that the south Korean "government" respect the elementary rights of workers and immediately release the arrested unionists, it said, and went on:
					
					The south Korean "government" is now escalating the provocative moves against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in the area of the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					It must stop all its provocative moves against the DPRK, including military exercises, at once and withdraw the foreign troops from south Korea.
					
					We strongly urge the south Korean authorities to drop their anti-DPRK policy and turn to the road for peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Premier coreano felicita a su homologo de Granada
articles.content:
Premier coreano felicita a su homologo de Granada
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ATCC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Il, envio este viernes un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo de Granada, Tillman Thomas, con motivo del 35o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					El remitente desea al destinatario los exitos en su labor para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ambicion de Japon de usurpar la isla Tok
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ambicion de Japon de usurpar la isla Tok
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, fue confirmado el hecho de que en el pasado el gobierno japones excluyo legalmente a la isla Tok de la lista de las islas anexas de Japon.
					La "orden de la oficina del premier No. 24" y el "decreto del Ministerio de Finanzas No.4" publicados en el ano 1951 en Japon, al distinguir a las islas coloniales de las japonesas, definieron que tanto las islas Ulung y Jeju como la isla Tok no son de Japon.
					
					Despues, el gobierno japones, al enmendarlos en 1960 y 1968, dejo intactos los articulos que anotan que la isla Tok no es de Japon.
					
					Los datos juridicos de Japon confirmados esta vez demuestran que este pais isleno no tiene fundamento juridico para insistir en que la isla en cuestion es la "suya".
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 6 y continua:
					
					Tal insistencia bandidesca parte del designio de causar y agravar el conflicto territorial y procurar asi un pretexto de nueva agresion a Corea.
					
					 Entre Corea y Japon no puede existir ninguna cuestion relacionada con el derecho de posesion de la isla Tok. Solo queda el problema de la indemnizacion a Corea por parte de Japon que en el pasado agredio a Corea y usurpo esa isla.
					
					 La capa dominante y los historiadores venales de Japon niegan numerosos testimonios historicos irrefutables e insisten en que es la "suya" la isla Tok basandose en algunos "materiales" falsos. De esta manera revelan por si mismos que Japon es el saqueador territorial mas descarado y gangsteril.
					
					 Este pais isleno no puede ganar nada con tal obstinada intencion de usurparla.
					
					La nacion coreana eleva mas la vigilancia a las cada dia mas abiertas maniobras de Japon de usurparla y esta lista para frustrarlas rotundamente.
					
					Japon debe justipreciar a su contraparte y abandonar su vana ilusion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a vivir no para hoy, sino para manana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a vivir no para hoy, sino para manana
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ATCC) -- En un editorial difundido este viernes, el periodico Rodong Sinmun llama a luchar energicamente por el futuro maravilloso de la patria socialista bajo la consigna de "!Vivir no para hoy, sino para manana!"
					La Revolucion Coreana se inicio y avanza triunfalmente gracias a los grandes hombres sin pares (el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la heroina de la lucha antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk) que asumieron las nobles responsabilidades por el destino de la patria y la nacion y amaron mucho al futuro.
					
					 Nuestro pueblo debe materializar a toda costa el proyecto y la decision del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de abrir de par en par las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en el ano 2012, en que se cumple el centenario de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, para mostrar a todo el mundo el radiante porvenir de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y de la Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					 El Dirigente Kim Jong Il tiene la gran concepcion de la revolucion y del futuro consistente en que la revolucion es la causa de amar al pueblo y los revolucionarios deben dedicar todo lo suyo para el futuro de la patria y la felicidad de todas las generaciones venideras aunque no lleguen a beneficiarse en su generacion.
					
					 Debemos coronar con preciosos meritos todos los momentos de la vida marcando con el corazon los pasos de noble abnegacion patriotica del Dirigente quien recorre sin treguas el largo camino de la direccion del Songun.
					
					Los martires revolucionarios de lucha antijaponesa son los que encarnaron perfectamente la concepcion de vida revolucionaria de vivir hoy para manana y los integrantes de la primera generacion de la Revolucion Coreana quienes crearon el ejemplo de como amar al futuro.
					
					 Solo cuando los miembros de nuevas generaciones lleven adelante ese noble espiritu y estilo de lucha de los martires, podran dar firme continuidad a la revolucion y garantizar la prosperidad eterna de nuestra patria. 
					
					 En la digna lucha de hoy por crear la historia de un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario de la epoca del Songun ellos deben dejar sus claras huellas patrioticas que queden para siempre en la memoria  de las generaciones venideras.
					
					Es muy prometedor el futuro de la Corea del Songun y en este mundo no hay otro pueblo revolucionario como el coreano que lucha y avanza con gran ambicion y esperanza en el futuro.
					
					 Por contar con la probada y habil direccion del gran partido, el invencible ejercito revolucionario y la unidad monolitica, fortalecidos cien veces en el fragor del Songun, y con la potencia espiritual de todos los militares y habitantes mas poderosa que el arma nuclear, es definitivo el triunfo de la marcha general para construir una gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda unidad de fuerzas patrioticas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda unidad de fuerzas patrioticas
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ATCC) -- La unidad de las fuerzas patrioticas deviene la garantia decisiva para impulsar victoriosamente el movimiento nacional por la reunificacion independiente rechazando todos los desafios de la historia.
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido el dia 6 y continua:
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar son los encargados insustituibles de resolver el problema de la reunificacion de la patria, que esta relacionado con la soberania nacional.
					
					 Oponerse a la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y perseguir el enfrentamiento y la division hablando hipocritamente de la reunificacion resulta una traicion a la nacion que va en contra de la reunificacion del pais y los intereses nacionales.
					
					Todas las fuerzas patrioticas del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben marchar firmemente unidas bajo la bandera de la reunificacion independiente. He aqui la clave para lograr con las propias fuerzas nacionales la reunificacion y la prosperidad rechazando cualquier desafio de las fuerzas divisionistas dentro y fuera del pais.
					
					 La realidad demuestra que si todas las fuerzas patrioticas surcoreanas no se levantan con las fuerzas unidas, sera frustrado por los tiranos fascistas el deseo del pueblo surcoreano sobre la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion de la patria y se produciran consecuencias irremediables.
					
					 Si uno se limita a desear la reunificacion y a denunciar a los traidores a la nacion solo con palabras, no puede dar por cumplida su mision de hoy.
					
					 Todos los que amen el pais y se preocupen del destino nacional, deberan sumarse al torrente de la gran unidad nacional y la lucha.
					
					 Si todas las clases y sectores se unen firmemente en el principio de poner en el primer lugar la demanda y los intereses comunes de la nacion por encima de las diferencias de la ideologia, el ideal, el criterio politico y la religion, la cantidad de propiedades y la posicion social, creceran considerablemente las fuerzas patrioticas y sera posible destruir cualquier desafio que les impida avanzar.
					
					 Solo cuando todos los coreanos de distintos sectores en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar marchen formando un inquebrantable bloque patriotico, tales fuerzas seran invencibles y se cumplira sin falta su justa causa.
